physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Fussy but consolable, mildly ill, multiple discrete, mobile, mildly enlarged, superficial cervical lymph nodes bilaterally, remainder of examination was normal.
Mild respiratory distress, dry lips, nasal flaring, suprasternal, intercostal, and subcostal retractions, remainder of the examination unchanged.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Signs of respiratory distress increased, with decreased oral intake and urine output.
